original: @#/_/rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi chu gtor bzhugs/🔽@##/_/skyabs 'gro sems bskyed byas la/_bdag nyid phyag na rdo
analyzed: @#/_/rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi chu gtor bzhugs/ @##/_/skyabs 'gro sems bskyed byas la/_bdag nyid phyag na rdo
translated: Taking Refuge and Arousing Bodhicitta

original: rje wal gyis bsgoms la lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/de
analyzed: rje wal gyis bsgoms la lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/de
translated: Then, visualize yourself instantly as Vajrapani and consecrate your body, speech, and mind.

original: nas om swa b+ha ba shud+d+ha _sarba b+ha ba shud+ho\u0f85ham zhes brjod pas chu gtor gyi🔽snod de stong par bsams la/_stong pa'i ngang las zlo ser po las gtor ma'i
analyzed: nas om swa b+ha ba shud+d+ha _sarba b+ha ba shud+ho\u0f85ham zhes brjod pas chu gtor gyi snod de stong par bsams la/_stong pa'i ngang las zlo ser po las gtor ma'i
translated: Then, recite Oṃ svabhāva śuddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāva śuddho ’haṃ and imagine that the vessel for the water offering becomes empty.

original: snod rin po che'i khang bu brtshegs pa/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi tshhad tsham du
analyzed: snod rin po che'i khang bu brtshegs pa/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi tshhad tsham du
translated: From the state of emptiness, imagine that the vessel for the water offering arises from a yellow oṃ and is a jeweled tiered pavilion the size of Mount Meru, the king of mountains.

original: bsams te/_de'i nang du gtor ma yi ge kham ljang gu las kha zas ro brgya pa/🔽nam mkha'i tshhad dang mnyam pa bsams te/_de'i nang du/_om a ka ro mu kham
analyzed: bsams te/_de'i nang du gtor ma yi ge kham ljang gu las kha zas ro brgya pa/ nam mkha'i tshhad dang mnyam pa bsams te/_de'i nang du/_om a ka ro mu kham
translated: Inside of that, imagine that the water offering arises from a green khaṃ and is food with a hundred flavors, the size of space.🔽Within that, recite Oṃ a kā ro mu khaṃ

original: sarba d+harma nam _ad+ya nut+pan+na tata om ahhum zhes 'jig rten pa'i bdud rtshir byin
analyzed: sarba d+harma nam _ad+ya nut+pan+na tata om ahhum zhes 'jig rten pa'i bdud rtshir byin
translated: sarva dharma ṇam ādyanutpannatā tattvā oṃ āḥ hūṃ and imagine that the water offering becomes an elixir of immortality.

original: gyis brlabs te/_om ahhu~m gsum gyis byin gyis brlab /_ye shes kyi bdud
analyzed: gyis brlabs te/_om ahhu~m gsum gyis byin gyis brlab /_ye shes kyi bdud
translated: Consecrate the wisdom elixir with:🔽oṃ ruru spuru jvala tiṣṭha siddha lōcana sarva artha

original: rtshir byin gyis brlab pa ni/_om ru ru spu ru dz+wa la tish+tha sid+d+ha lo tsha na sarba arba sa🔽d+ha na ye swa ha/_zhes bya ba sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags dang /_nam mkha'
analyzed: rtshir byin gyis brlab pa ni/_om ru ru spu ru dz+wa la tish+tha sid+d+ha lo tsha na sarba arba sa d+ha na ye swa ha/_zhes bya ba sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags dang /_nam mkha'
translated: sādhanaye svāhā.

original: bstan 'gyur_rgyud
analyzed: bstan 'gyur_rgyud
translated: Consecrate the space with:🔽oṃ namo bhagavate oṃ āḥ hūṃ.

original: mdzod kyi sngags kyis spel ba ni/_om na mah_@sarba ta tha ga te b+h+yoh /_bi shwa @mu
analyzed: mdzod kyi sngags kyis spel ba ni/_om na mah_@sarba ta tha ga te b+h+yoh /_bi shwa @mu
translated: Increase with the tantra’s mantra:🔽oṃ namo bhagavate oṃ āḥ hūṃ.

original: khe sarba tha kham u  te spa ra na hi mam ga ga na kham swa ha/_zhes lan gsum
analyzed: khe sarba tha kham u  te spa ra na hi mam ga ga na kham swa ha/_zhes lan gsum
translated: Recite that three times.

original: brjod do/_/rang gi sa bon las 'od 'phros pas nam mkha'i khams su hrih_las
analyzed: brjod do/_/rang gi sa bon las 'od 'phros pas nam mkha'i khams su hrih_las
translated: Light shines from one’s seed syllable, and hriḥ is visualized in the space.🔽From that, infinite lotuses are imagined.

original: pad+ma dpag tu med pa bsams te/_de'i steng du yi dam lha la sogs pa 'gro drug
analyzed: pad+ma dpag tu med pa bsams te/_de'i steng du yi dam lha la sogs pa 'gro drug
translated: Upon them, the yidam deity and so on are invited, as well as all six kinds of beings.

original: thams cad spyan drangs la/_de rnams la yang 'od phog pas sdig sgrib dag nas
analyzed: thams cad spyan drangs la/_de rnams la yang 'od phog pas sdig sgrib dag nas
translated: Light strikes them, purifying their negativities and obscurations.

original: yi dam gyi lhar byas la/_bdun rnam dag byas la bgegs bskrad pa ni a badzra pa
analyzed: yi dam gyi lhar byas la/_bdun rnam dag byas la bgegs bskrad pa ni a badzra pa
translated: Visualize the deities of the mandala and perform the seven-branch service.🔽Then, to expel the obstructors, recite:

original: ni a mr-i te kun+da li ha na ha na hum phat ces bya'o/_/om ni tam ba ra d+ha ra badzra
analyzed: ni a mr-i te kun+da li ha na ha na hum phat ces bya'o/_/om ni tam ba ra d+ha ra badzra
translated: oṃ vajra ḍāka hana hana hūṃ phaṭ🔽oṃ ni ti va pra dhara vajra ḍāka a jña pa ya ti i dam baliṃ gṛhaṇa tu sa ma ya

original: pa ni a dz+nya pa ya ti i dam ba lim gr-ih+na tu sa ma ya/_rak+tam tu ma ma sarba sid+d+ha me pra🔽yatsh+tshhan+tu ma ma sarba karma sa du swa ha/_zhes pas yi dam rnams la dbul/_mgron
analyzed: pa ni a dz+nya pa ya ti i dam ba lim gr-ih+na tu sa ma ya/_rak+tam tu ma ma sarba sid+d+ha me pra yatsh+tshhan+tu ma ma sarba karma sa du swa ha/_zhes pas yi dam rnams la dbul/_mgron
translated: raktaṃ tu ma ma sarva siddhi me pra yaccha tu ma ma sarva karmasadhu svāhā🔽Offer this to the deities of the mandala.

original: gzhan rnams la yang sbyin pa na/_na ma sarba ta tha ga ta a ba lo ki te om sam b+ha
analyzed: gzhan rnams la yang sbyin pa na/_na ma sarba ta tha ga ta a ba lo ki te om sam b+ha
translated: When you give to the other guests,🔽recite:🔽namaḥ sarva tathāgata abhilo kite oṃ sambhara sambhara hūṃ

original: ra sam b+ha ra hum zhes brjod pas byin gyis rlabs kyis phan tshhun zhe 'gras pa med pa
analyzed: ra sam b+ha ra hum zhes brjod pas byin gyis rlabs kyis phan tshhun zhe 'gras pa med pa
translated: Blessing them in this way, they will be free of mutual hostility🔽and will be endowed with perfect wealth.

original: dang /_'byor pa phun sum tshhogs par byas nas sngags 'dis yid la ci 'dod
analyzed: dang /_'byor pa phun sum tshhogs par byas nas sngags 'dis yid la ci 'dod
translated: Then, with this mantra, give them whatever they desire

original: pa dang /_mig sngar ci mdzes pa mngon par dga' ba dang /_mi skye ba'i chos
analyzed: pa dang /_mig sngar ci mdzes pa mngon par dga' ba dang /_mi skye ba'i chos
translated: and whatever is pleasing to their eyes.

original: la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/om ru ru spu ru dz+wa la tish+tha sid+d+hi rta lo tsha na sarba
analyzed: la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/om ru ru spu ru dz+wa la tish+tha sid+d+hi rta lo tsha na sarba
translated: Om ru ru spu ru dzwa la tishta siddhi ratna lo tsa na sarva🔽artha sadhana ya hum.

original: ar+tha sa d+ha na ya _ha/_sngags 'di gnyis lan bdun bdun du brjod do/_/
analyzed: ar+tha sa d+ha na ya _ha/_sngags 'di gnyis lan bdun bdun du brjod do/_/
translated: Recite these two mantras seven times each.🔽This is the generosity of material things.

analyzed: de ni zang zing gi sbyin pa'o/_/chos kyi sbyin pa ni rten 'brel snying po dang /_de
translated: The generosity of Dharma is the essence of dependent origination, and

translated: that which causes cessation.”🔽“Do not commit any evil,

analyzed: gsungs/_/sdig pa ci yang mi bgyi ste/_/dge ba phun sum tshhogs par spyad/_/
translated: practice virtue perfectly,🔽and thoroughly tame your own mind:

analyzed: rang gi sems ni yongs su dul/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/_/zhes

analyzed: pa dang /_de nas smon lam gdab pa ni/_dge ba 'di yis skye bo kun/_/
translated: “By this virtue may all beings

original: rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi chu gtor bzhugs
analyzed: rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi chu gtor bzhugs
translated: The Vajrapani Ablution

original: bsod nams ye shes tshhogs bsags te/_/bsod nams ye shes las byung ba'i/
analyzed: bsod nams ye shes tshhogs bsags te/_/bsod nams ye shes las byung ba'i/
translated: Accumulating the collections of merit and wisdom,

original: dam pa nyid ni thob par shog_/ces pa'o/_/de nas bden pa bdar ba ni/
analyzed: dam pa nyid ni thob par shog_/ces pa'o/_/de nas bden pa bdar ba ni/
translated: may I attain the state of the sublime,🔽which arises from merit and wisdom.🔽Then, recite the truth mantras:

original: sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang /_chos kyi bden pa dang /_gsang sngags dang / rig sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_/bdag gi bsam
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang /_chos kyi bden pa dang /_gsang sngags dang / rig sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_/bdag gi bsam
translated: The truth of the Buddha, the truth of the Dharma, the truth of the Secret Mantra, the truth of knowledge mantras, the truth of mudras, the truth of samadhi, and the power of my pure intention

original: pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa thams cad
analyzed: pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa thams cad
translated: pacify all harm of all sentient beings.

original: zhi nas bar chad dang gnod pa thams cad spangs te byams pa'i sems dang ldan
analyzed: zhi nas bar chad dang gnod pa thams cad spangs te byams pa'i sems dang ldan
translated: May they be free from all obstacles and harm and come to possess loving minds.

original: par gyur cig_/bdag gi dge ba'i rtsha ba 'di dag gis/_/klu rnams gnod pa🔽myur du zhi ba dang /_/bgegs dang log 'dren 'tshhe ba med pa dang /_/bdag
analyzed: par gyur cig_/bdag gi dge ba'i rtsha ba 'di dag gis/_/klu rnams gnod pa myur du zhi ba dang /_/bgegs dang log 'dren 'tshhe ba med pa dang /_/bdag
translated: By the power of these virtues of mine, may the harm of the nagas be pacified quickly,🔽may obstacles and misleading forces be eliminated, and may all my activities be accomplished.

original: gi las rnams thams cad 'grub par mdzod/_/de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge
analyzed: gi las rnams thams cad 'grub par mdzod/_/de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge
translated: Then, recite the syllable of Vajrasattva:

original: brgya pa brjod la/_badzra zhes zhes pas so sor rang gi gnas su gshegs par🔽bya'o/_/rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi chu gtor gyi cho ga slob dpon 'gro bzangs
analyzed: brgya pa brjod la/_badzra zhes zhes pas so sor rang gi gnas su gshegs par bya'o/_/rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi chu gtor gyi cho ga slob dpon 'gro bzangs
translated: Then, with “vajra raṇita,” they should be sent to their individual places.

original: snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//🔽rgya gar gyi mkhan po pan+di ta te dza de ba dang /_bod kyi sgra bsgyur gyi lo
analyzed: snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//_// rgya gar gyi mkhan po pan+di ta te dza de ba dang /_bod kyi sgra bsgyur gyi lo
translated: This concludes the ritual for the water offering of Vajra­nīvaraṇa­viṣkambhin composed by the master Jagaddarpaṇa.

original: tsha ba dge slong shes rab kyis zhus shing gtan la phab pa'o//_//🔽na ba dang lung la skyon bkag pas 'du ba nga tshho rgya'i mi khri kha phyogs
analyzed: tsha ba dge slong shes rab kyis zhus shing gtan la phab pa'o//_// na ba dang lung la skyon bkag pas 'du ba nga tshho rgya'i mi khri kha phyogs
translated: The Indian preceptor Paṇḍita Tejodeva and the Tibetan translator and monk Sherab Pal translated and finalized this text.

original: der kha gas pa/_lnga pa de kho ma de /gro _/yi ga  'o dang /_te dzo ka ba
analyzed: der kha gas pa/_lnga pa de kho ma de /gro _/yi ga  'o dang /_te dzo ka ba
translated: The fifth chapter of the Condensed Tantra of the Wheel of Time, the section on the water offering, is complete.

original: ma _gyur na kyi bu/_gal
analyzed: ma _gyur na kyi bu/_gal
translated: If the water offering is not performed,🔽the water offering is the life of the Dharma.
